definition[0]: (1980-) an English cricket player who was born in South Africa. He has played for the England national team and was captain for a short time (2008-2009). He was a member of the England teams that beat Australia to win the Ashes in 2005,2009, and 2010-2011. He has also played for the English county teams Nottinghamshire, Hampshire, and Surrey as well as for Royal Challengers Bangladore of the Indian Premier League. Pietersen is known for his exciting BATting style.
